definition: to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]

sentences.english: The fangs of surface humble, but the dog, full of greed narrow-minded.
sentences.chinese: 表面谦卑恭敬的大牙狗，实则心胸狭窄，充满贪欲。

sentences.english: I believe that punishing them by depriving them of sweet things only develops greediness.
sentences.chinese: 我想，罚孩子不吃甜馅饼，只能增强他们的贪欲。

sentences.english: Let's look at the first appearance of Mammon in Paradise Lost.
sentences.chinese: 请看在《失乐园》中贪欲之神第一次出现的地方。

sentences.english: Often , the swindlers scam by trading on people"s greed."
sentences.chinese: 骗子往往利用人的贪欲骗取钱财。

sentences.english: I don't think dick will ever manage to slake his lust for power.
sentences.chinese: 我认为迪克对权力的贪欲永远不会得到满足。

sentences.english: So the prevention of the corruption must start from the point of preventing avidity.
sentences.chinese: 贪官的预防，必须从预防贪欲开始。

sentences.english: Tere is a very fine line between loving life and being greedy for it.
sentences.chinese: 对生活的热爱和贪欲之间，只有一丝细微差别。
我们需要对贪欲加以约束。

sentences.english: Let people always act without human stategy or greediness.
sentences.chinese: 使民众去除追求个体贪欲的智能机巧。

sentences.english: And painters alluded to her eroticism in their bare breasted portrayals of the dying queen.
sentences.chinese: 画家们把她描绘为裸胸垂死的贪欲的女王。

sentences.english: Shrink greediness to zero; broaden the scope of mind as vast as the universe.
sentences.chinese: 贪欲缩小到零点，爱心扩大遍虚空。

sentences.english: All beings of the Desire Realm, with the exception of sages, are afflicted with untamable desires.
sentences.chinese: 欲界众生除了圣者以外，都有难以对治的贪欲。

sentences.english: I think all extramarital love is the outcome of greed.
sentences.chinese: 我认为一切婚外恋都是贪欲的产物。

sentences.english: It is time we tamed the greed of the selfish minority.
sentences.chinese: 是到了遏制那些极少数自私分子的贪欲的时候了。

sentences.english: Because greed kept on fueling it.
The Premier League, founded on avarice, is now on the edge of a precipice.
sentences.chinese: 建立于贪欲基础上的英超联赛现在已经到了悬崖边缘。

definition: bottomless pit of desire (idiom); insatiable greed/carnal cravings are never satisfied and are a main obstruction on the path to enlightenment
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
greedy for sex/given to lust for women
